channel.title: Paul Rand on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Paul Rand on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Forget Rand Paul, Let's Talk Paul Rand
item.description: Today in Tedium: A horrible thing has happened to search results in recent months. If you do a Google search for Paul Rand, nearly half the results on the first page—and all of the Google News results—are about Rand Paul, a man who has little to do with graceful, iconic logo design. In fact, if you actually knew something about logo design, you might be disappointed by Rand’s campaign logo. (It’s better than Hillary’s, we’ll give him that.
